title: Understanding Tax Filing Requirements
description: An exploration of who needs to file taxes, necessary tax forms, filing statuses, and key deadlines.
learning_objectives: Determine who needs to file a tax return based on income thresholds, age, and filing status
Identify common tax forms including W-2s, 1099s, and Form 1040
Understand how different filing statuses affect your tax obligations
Recognize important tax deadlines and consequences of missing them
Explain when filing might benefit you even if it's not required
